price: Enti ͻkaa ne dwumadie no so aba hwεe, na n’asεm no awieε yε berεguo.
arabic: فَذَاقَتۡ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهَا وَكَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ أَمۡرِهَا خُسۡرًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fadhāqat wabāla amrihā wakāna ʿāqibatu amrihā khus'ran
